data: It was a December morning,—the Missouri December of mild temperatures and saturated skies,—and the Chicago and Alton’s fast train, dripping from the rush through the wet night, had steamed briskly to its terminal track in the Union Station at Kansas City.
Missouri | Chicago and Alton | Union Station | Kansas City

It was a December morning,--the Missouri December of mild temperatures and saturated skies,--and the Chicago and Alton's fast train, dripping from the rush through the wet night, had steamed briskly to its terminal track in the Union Station at Kansas City.
